ORG.oclc.oai.harvester2.verb
Class HarvesterVerb

java.lang.Object
  ORG.oclc.oai.harvester2.verb.HarvesterVerb
Direct Known Subclasses:
GetRecord, Identify, ListIdentifiers, ListMetadataFormats, ListRecords, ListSets
public abstract class HarvesterVerb
extends java.lang.Object

HarvesterVerb is the parent class for each of the OAI verbs.

Author:
Jefffrey A. Young, OCLC Online Computer Library Center
